import psycopg2
try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Verificar estrutura da tabela de acompanhamento
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default
        FROM information_schema.columns 
        WHERE table_name = ''tb_hiperdia_has_acompanhamento''
        AND table_schema = ''sistemaaps''
        ORDER BY ordinal_position
    '''''')
    
    columns = cur.fetchall()
    print(''Estrutura atual da tabela tb_hiperdia_has_acompanhamento:'')
    print(''Column Name | Data Type | Nullable | Default'')
    print(''-'' * 60)
    for col in columns:
        print(f''{col[0]} | {col[1]} | {col[2]} | {col[3]}'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erro: {e}'')
")

Bash("C:\Users\Pichau\Desktop\SISTEMA APS\sistemaAPS\env\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
import psycopg2

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    # Ler o script SQL para criar a view de diabetes
    with open(''bd_sistema_aps/Scripts/Hiperdia/Diabetes/CREATE VIEW HIPERDIA - DIABETES.sql'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
        sql_script = f.read()
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Executar o script completo
    cur.execute(sql_script)
    conn.commit()
    
    print(''View mv_hiperdia_diabetes criada com sucesso!'')
    
    # Verificar se a view foi criada e testar uma consulta
    cur.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sistemaaps.mv_hiperdia_diabetes'')
    count = cur.fetchone()[0]
    print(f''Total de pacientes diabeticos encontrados: {count}'')
    
    # Mostrar alguns exemplos
    if count > 0:
        cur.execute(''SELECT cod_paciente, nome_paciente, tipo_diabetes, nome_equipe FROM sistemaaps.mv_hiperdia_diabetes LIMIT 5'')
        rows = cur.fetchall()
        print(''\nExemplos de pacientes diabeticos:'')
        for row in rows:
            print(f''ID: {row[0]}, Nome: {row[1]}, Tipo: {row[2]}, Equipe: {row[3]}'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erro ao criar view: {e}'')
")

import psycopg2

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    # Read and execute the insulin table script
    with open(''bd_sistema_aps/Scripts/Hiperdia/Diabetes/CREATE_TB_HIPERDIA_DM_INSULINA.sql'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
        sql_script = f.read()
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Execute the complete script
    cur.execute(sql_script)
    conn.commit()
    
    print(''Tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina criada com sucesso!'')
    
    # Verify the table was created and test a query
    cur.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina'')
    count = cur.fetchone()[0]
    print(f''Total de registros de insulina: {count}'')
    
    # Show some examples if there are records
    if count > 0:
        cur.execute(''SELECT cod_seq_insulina, codcidadao, tipo_insulina, frequencia_dia, doses_estruturadas FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina LIMIT 3'')
        rows = cur.fetchall()
        print(''\nExemplos de insulinas cadastradas:'')
        for row in rows:
            print(f''ID: {row[0]}, Paciente: {row[1]}, Tipo: {row[2]}, Freq: {row[3]}x/dia, Doses: {row[4]}'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erro ao criar tabela de insulina: {e}'')
")

Bash("C:\Users\Pichau\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import psycopg2

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Create the table without foreign key constraint
    create_table_sql = ''''''
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina (
        cod_seq_insulina SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
        codcidadao INTEGER NOT NULL,
        tipo_insulina VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (tipo_insulina IN (''''Insulina NPH'''', ''''Insulina Regular'''', ''''Insulina Glargina'''', ''''Insulina Lispro'''')),
        frequencia_dia INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK (frequencia_dia BETWEEN 1 AND 4),
        doses_estruturadas TEXT NOT NULL,
        data_inicio DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
        data_fim DATE NULL,
        observacoes TEXT,
        motivo_interrupcao TEXT,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
        updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    );
    ''''''
    
    cur.execute(create_table_sql)
    
    # Create trigger function
    trigger_function_sql = ''''''
    CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_insulina_timestamp()
    RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$__NEW_LINE__
    BEGIN
        NEW.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
        RETURN NEW;
    END;
    $$LANGUAGE plpgsql;
    ''''''
    
    cur.execute(trigger_function_sql)
    
    # Create trigger
    trigger_sql = ''''''
    DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS tr_update_insulina_timestamp ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina;
    CREATE TRIGGER tr_update_insulina_timestamp
        BEFORE UPDATE ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina
        FOR EACH ROW
        EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_insulina_timestamp();
    ''''''
    
    cur.execute(trigger_sql)
    
    # Create indexes
    indexes_sql = ''''''
    CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_cidadao ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(codcidadao);
    CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_ativa ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(codcidadao, data_fim) WHERE data_fim IS NULL;
    CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_tipo ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(tipo_insulina);
    CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_frequencia ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(frequencia_dia);
    ''''''
    
    cur.execute(indexes_sql)
    
    # Add sample data (need to use real patient codes)
    sample_data_sql = ''''''
    INSERT INTO sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina (
        codcidadao, 
        tipo_insulina, 
        frequencia_dia, 
        doses_estruturadas, 
        observacoes
    ) VALUES 
    (
        12499, 
        ''''Insulina NPH'''', 
        2, 
        ''''[{"dose": 12, "horario": "08:00"}, {"dose": 8, "horario": "20:00"}]'''',
        ''''Exemplo: NPH 2x ao dia - manhÃ£ e noite''''
    )
    ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;
    ''''''
    
    cur.execute(sample_data_sql)
    
    conn.commit()
    
    print(''Tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina criada com sucesso!'')
    
    # Verify the table was created and test a query
    cur.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina'')
    count = cur.fetchone()[0]
    print(f''Total de registros de insulina: {count}'')
    
    # Show table structure
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable 
        FROM information_schema.columns 
        WHERE table_name = ''''tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina''''
        AND table_schema = ''''sistemaaps''''
        ORDER BY ordinal_position
    '''''')
    
    columns = cur.fetchall()
    print(''\nEstrutura da tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina:'')
    for col in columns:
        print(f''  {col[0]} - {col[1]} (nullable: {col[2]})'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erro ao criar tabela de insulina: {e}'')
")

import psycopg2

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Create the table without foreign key constraint
    create_table_sql = ''''''
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina (
        cod_seq_insulina SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
        codcidadao INTEGER NOT NULL,
        tipo_insulina VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (tipo_insulina IN (''Insulina NPH'', ''Insulina Regular'', ''Insulina Glargina'', ''Insulina Lispro'')),
        frequencia_dia INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK (frequencia_dia BETWEEN 1 AND 4),
        doses_estruturadas TEXT NOT NULL,
        data_inicio DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
        data_fim DATE NULL,
        observacoes TEXT,
        motivo_interrupcao TEXT,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
        updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    );
    ''''''
    
    cur.execute(create_table_sql)
    
    # Create trigger function
    cur.execute(''''''
    CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_insulina_timestamp()
    RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$__NEW_LINE__
    BEGIN
        NEW.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
        RETURN NEW;
    END;
    $$LANGUAGE plpgsql;
    '''''')
    
    # Create trigger
    cur.execute(''''''
    DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS tr_update_insulina_timestamp ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina;
    CREATE TRIGGER tr_update_insulina_timestamp
        BEFORE UPDATE ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina
        FOR EACH ROW
        EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_insulina_timestamp();
    '''''')
    
    # Create indexes
    cur.execute(''CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_cidadao ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(codcidadao);'')
    cur.execute(''CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_ativa ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(codcidadao, data_fim) WHERE data_fim IS NULL;'')
    cur.execute(''CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_tipo ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(tipo_insulina);'')
    cur.execute(''CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_dm_insulina_frequencia ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(frequencia_dia);'')
    
    conn.commit()
    
    print(''Tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina criada com sucesso!'')
    
    # Verify the table was created
    cur.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina'')
    count = cur.fetchone()[0]
    print(f''Total de registros de insulina: {count}'')
    
    # Show table structure
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable 
        FROM information_schema.columns 
        WHERE table_name = ''tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina''
        AND table_schema = ''sistemaaps''
        ORDER BY ordinal_position
    '''''')
    
    columns = cur.fetchall()
    print(''\nEstrutura da tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina:'')
    for col in columns:
        print(f''  {col[0]} - {col[1]} (nullable: {col[2]})'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erro ao criar tabela de insulina: {e}'')
")

Bash("C:\Users\Pichau\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import psycopg2

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # First, check if table already exists
    cur.execute(""""""
    SELECT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 
        FROM information_schema.tables 
        WHERE table_schema = ''sistemaaps'' 
        AND table_name = ''tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina''
    )
    """""")
    
    table_exists = cur.fetchone()[0]
    
    if table_exists:
        print(''Tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina jÃ¡ existe!'')
        # Show current records
        cur.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina'')
        count = cur.fetchone()[0]
        print(f''Total de registros de insulina: {count}'')
    else:
        print(''Tabela nÃ£o existe, criando...'')
        
        # Create the table step by step
        cur.execute(""""""
        CREATE TABLE sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina (
            cod_seq_insulina SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
            codcidadao INTEGER NOT NULL,
            tipo_insulina VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
            frequencia_dia INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK (frequencia_dia BETWEEN 1 AND 4),
            doses_estruturadas TEXT NOT NULL,
            data_inicio DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
            data_fim DATE NULL,
            observacoes TEXT,
            motivo_interrupcao TEXT,
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        );
        """""")
        
        # Add constraint separately
        cur.execute(""""""
        ALTER TABLE sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
        ADD CONSTRAINT check_tipo_insulina 
        CHECK (tipo_insulina IN (''Insulina NPH'', ''Insulina Regular'', ''Insulina Glargina'', ''Insulina Lispro''));
        """""")
        
        # Create indexes
        cur.execute(''CREATE INDEX idx_dm_insulina_cidadao ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(codcidadao);'')
        cur.execute(''CREATE INDEX idx_dm_insulina_ativa ON sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina(codcidadao, data_fim) WHERE data_fim IS NULL;'')
        
        conn.commit()
        print(''Tabela criada com sucesso!'')
    
    # Show table structure
    cur.execute(""""""
        SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable 
        FROM information_schema.columns 
        WHERE table_name = ''tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina''
        AND table_schema = ''sistemaaps''
        ORDER BY ordinal_position
    """""")
    
    columns = cur.fetchall()
    print(''\nEstrutura da tabela tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina:'')
    for col in columns:
        print(f''  {col[0]} - {col[1]} (nullable: {col[2]})'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Erro: {e}'')
")

Bash("C:\Users\Pichau\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import psycopg2

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Add missing columns for insulin modification tracking
    alter_queries = [
        ''''''ALTER TABLE sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
           ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT ''ATIVO'' 
           CHECK (status IN (''ATIVO'', ''SUBSTITUIDO'', ''INTERROMPIDO''))'''''',
        
        ''''''ALTER TABLE sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
           ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS cod_insulina_anterior INTEGER'''''',
        
        ''''''ALTER TABLE sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
           ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS motivo_modificacao TEXT''''''
    ]
    
    for query in alter_queries:
        print(f''Executing: {query}'')
        cur.execute(query)
    
    # Update existing records to have ATIVO status
    cur.execute(''UPDATE sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina SET status = \''ATIVO\'' WHERE status IS NULL'')
    
    conn.commit()
    print(''Successfully added missing columns and updated existing records!'')
    
    # Verify the changes
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT column_name, data_type, column_default 
        FROM information_schema.columns 
        WHERE table_name = ''tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina''
        AND table_schema = ''sistemaaps''
        AND column_name IN (''status'', ''cod_insulina_anterior'', ''motivo_modificacao'')
        ORDER BY column_name
    '''''')
    
    columns = cur.fetchall()
    print(''\nNew columns added:'')
    for col in columns:
        print(f''  {col[0]} - {col[1]} (default: {col[2]})'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

import psycopg2
import json

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check current insulin records
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT cod_seq_insulina, codcidadao, tipo_insulina, frequencia_dia, 
               doses_estruturadas, status, data_fim IS NULL as ativo
        FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
        ORDER BY cod_seq_insulina 
        LIMIT 5
    '''''')
    
    insulins = cur.fetchall()
    print(''Current insulin records:'')
    for insulin in insulins:
        cod_seq, codcidadao, tipo, freq, doses, status, ativo = insulin
        print(f''  ID: {cod_seq}, Patient: {codcidadao}, Type: {tipo}, Freq: {freq}x/day, Status: {status}, Active: {ativo}'')
        if doses:
            try:
                doses_parsed = json.loads(doses)
                print(f''    Doses: {doses_parsed}'')
            except:
                print(f''    Doses (raw): {doses}'')
    
    # Test the new API endpoint by getting details of first active insulin
    cur.execute(''SELECT cod_seq_insulina FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina WHERE data_fim IS NULL LIMIT 1'')
    result = cur.fetchone()
    
    if result:
        test_insulin_id = result[0]
        print(f''\nTesting API with insulin ID: {test_insulin_id}'')
        
        # This would normally be done via HTTP request, but we can test the query directly
        cur.execute(''''''
            SELECT cod_seq_insulina, codcidadao, tipo_insulina, frequencia_dia, 
                   doses_estruturadas, data_inicio, data_fim, observacoes,
                   status, motivo_interrupcao, created_at, updated_at
            FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
            WHERE cod_seq_insulina = %s AND data_fim IS NULL
        '''''', (test_insulin_id,))
        
        details = cur.fetchone()
        if details:
            print(''API query would return:'')
            print(f''  Success: True'')
            print(f''  Insulin details: {details}'')
        else:
            print(''No active insulin found for testing'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

Bash("C:\Users\Pichau\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import psycopg2
import json

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
        host=''localhost'',
        database=''esus'',
        user=''postgres'',
        password=''EUC[x*x~Mc#S+H_Ui#xZBr0O~'',
        port=''5433''
    )
    
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Test the insulin API that our frontend will call
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT cod_seq_insulina, codcidadao, tipo_insulina, frequencia_dia, 
               doses_estruturadas, data_inicio, observacoes, status
        FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
        WHERE data_fim IS NULL AND status = ''ATIVO''
        ORDER BY codcidadao, cod_seq_insulina 
    '''''')
    
    insulins = cur.fetchall()
    print(''Test insulin display data:'')
    print(''='' * 50)
    
    for insulin in insulins:
        cod_seq, codcidadao, tipo, freq, doses_str, data_inicio, obs, status = insulin
        print(f''Patient ID: {codcidadao}'')
        print(f''Insulin: {tipo}'')
        print(f''Frequency: {freq}x/day'')
        print(f''Raw doses: {doses_str}'')
        
        # Parse and format doses like our JavaScript function
        try:
            doses = json.loads(doses_str)
            doses_formatadas = ''/''.join([f''{dose[""dose""]}U'' for dose in doses])
            print(f''Formatted display: {tipo} - {doses_formatadas}'')
            print(f''Expected icon color: NPH=green, Regular=yellow, Glargina=purple, Lispro=blue'')
        except Exception as e:
            print(f''Error parsing doses: {e}'')
        
        print(''-'' * 30)
    
    # Also check for patients with both medications and insulins
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT DISTINCT codcidadao 
        FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_dm_insulina 
        WHERE data_fim IS NULL AND status = ''ATIVO''
    '''''')
    
    insulin_patients = [row[0] for row in cur.fetchall()]
    
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT DISTINCT codcidadao 
        FROM sistemaaps.tb_hiperdia_has_medicamentos 
        WHERE data_fim IS NULL OR data_fim > CURRENT_DATE
    '''''')
    
    med_patients = [row[0] for row in cur.fetchall()]
    
    # Find patients with both
    both_patients = list(set(insulin_patients) & set(med_patients))
    print(f''\nPatients with both medications and insulins: {both_patients}'')
    print(f''Patients with only insulins: {list(set(insulin_patients) - set(med_patients))}'')
    print(f''Patients with only medications: {list(set(med_patients) - set(insulin_patients))}'')
    
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

import requests
import json

# Test the API endpoints that our JavaScript will call
try:
    # Test patient 12499 who has insulin
    patient_id = 12499
    
    print(f''Testing API endpoints for patient {patient_id}:'')
    print(''='' * 50)
    
    # Test medications API
    med_url = f''http://127.0.0.1:3030/api/diabetes/medicamentos_atuais/{patient_id}''
    print(f''GET {med_url}'')
    
    try:
        med_response = requests.get(med_url, timeout=5)
        med_data = med_response.json()
        print(f''Medications response: {med_data}'')
    except requests.exceptions.ConnectRefused:
        print(''Connection refused - server may not be running on this endpoint'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''Medications API error: {e}'')
    
    # Test insulins API  
    insulin_url = f''http://127.0.0.1:3030/api/diabetes/insulinas/{patient_id}''
    print(f''\nGET {insulin_url}'')
    
    try:
        insulin_response = requests.get(insulin_url, timeout=5)
        insulin_data = insulin_response.json()
        print(f''Insulins response: {insulin_data}'')
        
        # Test formatting like our JavaScript function
        if insulin_data.get(''sucesso'') and insulin_data.get(''insulinas''):
            for insulin in insulin_data[''insulinas'']:
                doses_estruturadas = insulin.get(''doses_estruturadas'', [])
                if isinstance(doses_estruturadas, str):
                    doses_estruturadas = json.loads(doses_estruturadas)
                
                doses_formatadas = ''/''.join([f''{dose[""dose""]}U'' for dose in doses_estruturadas])
                tipo = insulin.get(''tipo_insulina'', ''Unknown'')
                print(f''\nFormatted display: {tipo} - {doses_formatadas}'')
                
                # Determine color
                color_map = {
                    ''Insulina NPH'': ''green'',
                    ''Insulina Regular'': ''yellow'', 
                    ''Insulina Glargina'': ''purple'',
                    ''Insulina Lispro'': ''blue''
                }
                color = color_map.get(tipo, ''orange'')
                print(f''Icon: ðŸ’‰ (syringe) Color: {color}'')
                
    except requests.exceptions.ConnectRefused:
        print(''Connection refused - server may not be running on this endpoint'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''Insulins API error: {e}'')
    
    # Test with patient 16885 who has multiple insulins
    patient_id_2 = 16885
    print(f''\n\nTesting patient {patient_id_2} (multiple insulins):'')
    print(''='' * 50)
    
    insulin_url_2 = f''http://127.0.0.1:3030/api/diabetes/insulinas/{patient_id_2}''
    
    try:
        insulin_response_2 = requests.get(insulin_url_2, timeout=5)
        insulin_data_2 = insulin_response_2.json()
        print(f''Insulins response: {insulin_data_2}'')
        
        if insulin_data_2.get(''sucesso'') and insulin_data_2.get(''insulinas''):
            for insulin in insulin_data_2[''insulinas'']:
                doses_estruturadas = insulin.get(''doses_estruturadas'', [])
                if isinstance(doses_estruturadas, str):
                    doses_estruturadas = json.loads(doses_estruturadas)
                
                doses_formatadas = ''/''.join([f''{dose[""dose""]}U'' for dose in doses_estruturadas])
                tipo = insulin.get(''tipo_insulina'', ''Unknown'')
                print(f''Display: {tipo} - {doses_formatadas}'')
                
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''Error: {e}'')
        
except Exception as e:
    print(f''General error: {e}'')
")

import requests
import json

try:
    # Test the insulin API response and parsing logic
    patient_id = 12499  # Patient with NPH insulin
    
    print(f''Testing FIXED insulin dose parsing for patient {patient_id}:'')
    print(''='' * 60)
    
    # Test insulin API
    insulin_url = f''http://127.0.0.1:3030/api/diabetes/insulinas/{patient_id}''
    response = requests.get(insulin_url, timeout=5)
    data = response.json()
    
    if data.get(''sucesso'') and data.get(''insulinas''):
        for insulin in data[''insulinas'']:
            print(f''Insulin Type: {insulin.get(""tipo_insulina"")}'')
            print(f''Frequency: {insulin.get(""frequencia_dia"")}x/day'')
            print(f''Raw doses_estruturadas: {insulin.get(""doses_estruturadas"")}'')
            print(f''Type of doses_estruturadas: {type(insulin.get(""doses_estruturadas""))}'')
            
            # Test our JavaScript formatting logic in Python
            doses_raw = insulin.get(''doses_estruturadas'')
            
            if doses_raw:
                # Simulate what our fixed JavaScript function does
                if isinstance(doses_raw, str):
                    try:
                        doses = json.loads(doses_raw)
                        print(f''Parsed doses (from string): {doses}'')
                    except json.JSONDecodeError:
                        print(''ERROR: Could not parse JSON string'')
                        continue
                else:
                    doses = doses_raw
                    print(f''Direct doses (already parsed): {doses}'')
                
                if isinstance(doses, list) and len(doses) > 0:
                    formatted_doses = ''/''.join([f''{dose[""dose""]}U'' for dose in doses if ''dose'' in dose])
                    print(f''Expected display format: {insulin.get(""tipo_insulina"")} - {formatted_doses}'')
                    
                    # Determine color based on type
                    colors = {
                        ''Insulina NPH'': ''GREEN'',
                        ''Insulina Regular'': ''YELLOW'',
                        ''Insulina Glargina'': ''PURPLE'',
                        ''Insulina Lispro'': ''BLUE''
                    }
                    color = colors.get(insulin.get(''tipo_insulina''), ''ORANGE'')
                    print(f''Icon: [SYRINGE-{color}]'')
                else:
                    print(''ERROR: Invalid doses format'')
            else:
                print(''ERROR: No doses_estruturadas found'')
            
            print(''-'' * 40)
    else:
        print(''No insulin data found'')
        
    print(''\nTesting patient with multiple insulins...'')
    
    # Test patient 16885 with multiple insulins
    patient_id_2 = 16885
    insulin_url_2 = f''http://127.0.0.1:3030/api/diabetes/insulinas/{patient_id_2}''
    response_2 = requests.get(insulin_url_2, timeout=5)
    data_2 = response_2.json()
    
    if data_2.get(''sucesso'') and data_2.get(''insulinas''):
        for i, insulin in enumerate(data_2[''insulinas'']):
            doses_raw = insulin.get(''doses_estruturadas'')
            
            if isinstance(doses_raw, str):
                doses = json.loads(doses_raw)
            else:
                doses = doses_raw
            
            formatted_doses = ''/''.join([f''{dose[""dose""]}U'' for dose in doses if ''dose'' in dose])
            print(f''Insulin {i+1}: {insulin.get(""tipo_insulina"")} - {formatted_doses}'')
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

    examples = [

        {''freq'': 2, ''doses'': [{''dose'': 12, ''horario'': ''08:00''}, {''dose'': 8, ''horario'': ''20:00''}], ''display'': ''12U/8U''},
        {''freq'': 3, ''doses'': [{''dose'': 10, ''horario'': ''08:00''}, {''dose'': 10, ''horario'': ''12:00''}, {''dose'': 10, ''horario'': ''20:00''}], ''display'': ''10U/10U/10U''}
    ]

print(''='' * 50)
